name: CraftyChristmas
0:
”Alexa, open Crafty Christmas”
”Alexa, ask Crafty Christmas for a project”
”Alexa, start Crafty Christmas”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: crafty christmas
des: Now you can get great Christmas craft ideas that are fun for the whole family! Just ask Alexa to open Crafty Christmas and she will give you a quick and easy craft idea that is perfect for the holidays. New crafts are added frequently so check back often to get inspired.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
